Description:
Detects process access requests to LSASS process with potentially suspicious access flags

Author: Florian Roth, Roberto Rodriguez, Dimitrios Slamaris, Mark Russinovich, Thomas Patzke, Teymur Kheirkhabarov, Sherif Eldeeb, James Dickenson, Aleksey Potapov, oscd.community
Sigma Repository: [GitHub](https://github.com/SigmaHQ/sigma)
Name: Potentially Suspicious GrantedAccess Flags On LSASS
Query: sourcetype='windows-sysmon' eql select * from _source_ where ((((granted_access like '%30' or granted_access like '%50' or granted_access like '%70' or granted_access like '%90' or granted_access like '%b0' or granted_access like '%d0' or granted_access like '%f0' or granted_access like '%18' or granted_access like '%38' or granted_access like '%58' or granted_access like '%78' or granted_access like '%98' or granted_access like '%b8' or granted_access like '%d8' or granted_access like '%f8' or granted_access like '%1a' or granted_access like '%3a' or granted_access like '%5a' or granted_access like '%7a' or granted_access like '%9a' or granted_access like '%ba' or granted_access like '%da' or granted_access like '%fa' or granted_access like '%0x14c2') and (granted_access like '0x100000%' or granted_access like '0x1418%' or granted_access like '0x1438%' or granted_access like '0x143a%' or granted_access like '0x1f0fff%' or granted_access like '0x1f1fff%' or granted_access like '0x1f2fff%' or granted_access like '0x1f3fff%' or granted_access like '0x40%')) and dst_process_path like '%\lsass.exe') and  not (((call_trace like '%|?:\programdata\microsoft\windows defender\definition updates\{%' and call_trace like '%}\mpengine.dll+%') and granted_access = '0x1418') or (process_path like '%:\program files (x86)\%' or process_path like '%:\program files\%' or process_path like '%:\windows\system32\%' or process_path like '%:\windows\syswow64\%') or (process_path like '%\explorer.exe' and granted_access = '0x401') or (process_path like '%:\programdata\microsoft\windows defender\%' and process_path like '%\msmpeng.exe') or (call_trace like '%|c:\program files\windows defender\mprtp.dll%' or call_trace like '%|c:\program files\windows defender\mpclient.dll%')) and  not (((process_path like '%\handle.exe' or process_path like '%\handle64.exe') and granted_access = '0x40') or process_path like '%:\programdata\malwarebytes\mbamservice\ctlrupdate\mbupdatr.exe' or (process_path like '%\appdata\local\webex\webexhost.exe' and granted_access = '0x401') or process_path like '%\appdata\local\programs\microsoft vs code\code.exe' or (process_path like '%\mbaminstallerservice.exe' and granted_access = '0x40') or ((process_path like '%\procexp64.exe' or process_path like '%\procexp.exe') and granted_access = '0x40') or ((process_path like '%\aurora-agent-64.exe' or process_path like '%\aurora-agent.exe' or process_path like '%\thor.exe' or process_path like '%\thor64.exe') and granted_access = '0x40') or process_path like '%\steamlibrary\steamapps\%' or (process_path like '%:\programdata\vmware\vmware tools\%' and process_path like '%\vmtoolsd.exe')))
